place_description: Local Eastern Cafe located inside SipCity! We offer quality house made syrups, food and good vibes. We have plenty of room with comfortable couches, FREE WIFI. So, come in for your Daily Ritual! See you soon Cheers!

reviews_data.review_text: amazing vibe. great coffee by day, great bottle shop by night. highly recommend.
Delicious chai with homemade syrup and nice owner and good vibes

This coffee shop is so warm and welcoming! The two employees made an effort to talk to all of their customers in a friendly manner. I've never had this homey of an experience at a coffee shop. Well be coming back!
The vibes in this place are immaculate. And my coffee was super good as well. I wish I lived closer to this coffee shop, but any time I'm in the area I will be stopping by!!

My husband and I were in town for a day before we made our drive back to Virginia. Him knowing how much I love local coffee shops and supporting small businesses, he took me to The Daily Ritual. Right off the bat when you walk into this "feel-good," shop we were greeted by the owner with a warm welcome! He was very nice and easy to talk too, in a sense it made you feel like a regular even if it was your first time there. He recommended two coffees, The Ritual and the Vanilla Bean Lattes. I, being a cinnamon lover, got the Cinnabon Latte with no moo milk (had almond milk!) and my husband got The Ritual. I would have never thought to put cardamon in coffee until trying The Ritual and I will definitely have to say, you have to give this coffee a try! Both coffees were delicious and warmed us up both perfectly on this cold day. We also ended up having the Croissant Caprese which tasted just like you were eating a Caprese but with bread!

Highly recommend stopping by this cozy shop. Coffee was great, food was great, atmosphere inviting but most of all the owner was so welcoming and personable!
Gem of a place, great coffee great vibe.
Super cool location. Employees are friendly and made great recommendations.

Stopped in for an iced latte. This place has a friendly, local shop type vibe, and a great alternative to the faceless corporation that is Starbucks if you're looking for a tasty coffee. Coffee was excellent, and if you're into syrups, they are all hand made on site with fresh ingredients. If you're a PM local, let them know and you get a discount as well!
Had a life changing vanilla latte, could feel the vanilla beans in my veins it was incredible.
This place is awesome! Great coffee and food. Cool shop,  and the owners are crazy nice. I'll stop by every time I'm in the area.

Beautiful place, great location, EXCELLENT coffee and service. They make a lot of their own syrups and the cardamom syrup (the ritual) is to die for. Hassan is super sweet and very welcoming. I wish I lived here so I could make this my daily coffee shop!

Stopped in after getting a flat tire near by and thank god I did!! Hassan was very friendly, knowledgeable, and made me the best vanilla bean iced latte i've ever had! The delicious cold foam was just the cherry on top!! Will be recommending to all my friends and will absolutely be back! Thanks Hassan!

Please, go to this place. The atmosphere is amazing, and the Coffee is second to none. Hassan is a great guy who will ensure you have a great experience. You can bring your Dog, play board games, and drink Wine and Beer.. it is a super cool place and the price is very fair. Please consider ordering the "croissant caprese", highly recommend it.

The food was amazing! I ordered the signature drink, Daily Ritual, and a chai that was splendid. Both were sweet with nuanced flavors and earthy texture. Hassan was knowledgeable about the drinks and their ingredients. I also ordered a croissant caprese which was surprisingly harty and filling. Hassan is incredibly personable, friendly, and passionate about the work that he's doing and I look forward to seeing what cool stuff he and his team will make.

All together, with some CBD lemonade, it totaled out to about $34 which seems pretty reasonable for the quality of food, real ingredients, and delicious experience.

I stopped by to grab an iced matcha on my way to run errands and was pleasantly surprised by what a cool spot this is!

The owner is so nice and friendly. He recommended the orange blossom matcha and it was so delicious.

They have a huge variety of drinks (including beer and wine) and food so you will definitely find something you like there.

It looks like a cool spot to get some work done also. There are comfy chairs and tables perfect for a laptop sesh.

p.s. parking is behind the building across the street

I love Sip City for afternoon bevvies and have just tried Daily Ritual Coffee for my morning treat, it's SO GOOD! The coffee is great, I got the signature latte which has cardamom and cinnamon and it's not too sweet, not too spicy, just a truly excellent cup of coffee. Of course, just like anyone who works in this establishment day or night the service is great and it's a super chill place to hang out!

Coffee place in the morning; wine and beer place in the afternoon and evening.  Morning coffee was fantastic - always enjoy my coffee black and they use an excellent roaster.  Lots of flavor yet smooth.  Even though I'm just visiting Charlotte I plan to stop by at least one more time before I leave.
Absolutely peak coffee with great service. A coffee shop inside Sip City that you have to stop in for. Order the handmade chai, especially if you enjoy a perfect dirty chai latte!
This was my favorite spot on my weekend trip to Charlotte! Great coffee, plenty of non-alcoholic options, games, and a very chill atmosphere. 11/10
Best coffee in charlotte!
Lovely place to hang around
i love the coffee here!! hassan and paige are both awesome. i got the vanilla bean latte with oat milk. I used to go to central coffee or undercurrent but daily ritual has won me over!!

Went On a quick getaway trip to NC....I needed coffee badly. I found this neat place. There I was introduced to Turkish coffee by this handsome young man Hassn. The way he poured and served it to me, it was amazing and tasted delicious. I will definitely be back here for my coffee. This place is a must visit hands down. Best of luck and many blessings to your new shop Hassn. Until next time.

Ms. CANDICE WATKINS

What I've tried so far is top notch. Hassan was super friendly and clearly has a passion for his coffee. He even surprised us with a neighborhood discount! Will definitely be back, loved getting some work done from here.
Awesome place and great coffee. The guy who worked there (assuming Hassan from the other reviews) was super friendly and asked for feedback on his chai latte. Baklava looks delicious

10/10 experience, so glad I found this place. First time trying Turkish coffee and I loved it. The customer service was incredible. The owner actually made me the coffee himself. Will be back for sure!
Get the ritual latte and the caprese croissant, you won't be disappointed! The place has a really cool vibe and the owner Hassan is friendly! He even made a pup cup for my friends dog

Hassan, the owner of Daily Ritual was extremely friendly and welcoming. I ordered a espresso shot "for here" and it was given to me in a cool/decorative mug (it stuck with the vibes and branding). I had asked for a sidecar as well (soda water), and he managed to grab one for me too. He was very open to hearing suggestions and thoughts on his coffee as I had explained that I do espresso reviews for myself often. The espresso was pretty solid, very smooth, not as strong/oily thick compared to other espressos here in Charlotte (which is what prefer), but if you were looking for some smooth coffee drinks, this is the place! They're merging with Sip City (beer/wine shop), and their space is comfortable and chill. Good place to hangout with friends and hold conversations!

Dropped into this new coffee shop that is located inside of Sip City at the Central Ave five points intersection.

The service was friendly and helpful and, if you aren't already familiar with Sip City, the decor is very inviting and comfortable, with a lot of natural light during the day. Despite ongoing construction out front, the inside of the shop was peaceful, with very little noise if any filtering in.

The proprietor of the coffee shop recommended "the Ritual," a latte flavored with a bit of cardamom. Cardamom is a love it or hate it kind of spice, but I happen to enjoy it so I took him up on his recommendation and I am happy that I did.

The spice was balanced expertly by the dairy, so much so that it could be worth a shot for those who are on the fence about cardamom.

Will be back soon.
Warm welcome when I walked in. Hassan made my coffee and croissant. Both were wonderful. I will definitely frequent this place. Best coffee I've had in Charlotte and even better service
